ShowOtherwise.title: Show Otherwise
ShowOtherwise.description: Show for dialogue boxes that are neither questions nor have NPC portraits
FacingFront.title: Facing Front
FacingFront.description: If not set, the portrait will face right (only meaningful if there is no custom portrait)
CustomPortrait.title: Use Custom Portrait
CustomPortrait.description: If a custom portrait png is loaded, use it for the portrait
CustomBackground.title: Use Custom Background
CustomBackground.description: If a custom background png is loaded, use it for the background
PortraitReactions.title: Farmer reactions
PortraitReactions.description: The farmer will react according to a NPC's shown emotion.
SpecificReactions.title: Specific reactions
SpecificReactions.description: The way a farmer should react to NPCs' emotions. This is in general, but you can customize them per-character with ContentPatcher.)
FixText.title: Fix text
FixText.description: If a dialogue is too long, it'll be continued in the next window.
